scripts.migrate:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev.circle.api dotenv -e .env.dev.circle.api -- sequelize db:migrate --env development
scripts.migrate:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod.circle.api dotenv -e .env.prod.circle.api -- sequelize db:migrate --env development
scripts.migrate:undo:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev.circle.api dotenv -e .env.dev.circle.api -- sequelize db:migrate:undo --env development
scripts.migrate:undo:all:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev.circle.api dotenv -e .env.dev.circle.api -- sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env development
scripts.migrate:undo:all:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod.circle.api dotenv -e .env.prod.circle.api -- sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env development
